general_dataELoadingrrorMessage: An error occurred while loading data
general_dataLoadingErrorMessage: An error occurred while loading data
general_deleteConfirmationMessage: Do you want to delete this record?
general_deleteQuestion: Are you sure you want to delete?
app_abouttheAppMessage1: This app is designed to help users manage and store their notes.
app_abouttheAppMessage2: You can use the plus button in the bottom right corner to add a note. You can edit or delete notes by tapping on them.
app_abouttheAppMessage3: Backup and restore options are provided to ensure the safety of your notes. You can use the menu in the top right corner to backup.
database_folderandFileNameSelection: Please enter a file name and select a backup location.
database_fileNameWarningMessage: To backup, the file name must be at least 3 characters long.
database_getBackupMessage: Enter backup file name (at least 3 characters)
database_deleteConfirmMessage: Do you want to delete this backup?
database_restoreConfirmMessage: Do you want to restore this backup?
logout_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to log out?
menu_deleteBackupConfirmMessage: Do you want to delete this backup?
infoP1: This application is designed to help users manage and store their notes.
infoP2: You can use the plus button in the bottom right corner to add a note. You can edit or delete notes by tapping on them.
infoP3: Backup and restore options are provided to ensure the safety of your notes. You can use the menu in the top right corner to backup.
kilavuz_situationsContent: The Statuses screen displays status information, allows adding new statuses, and editing or deleting existing ones.
kilavuz_categoriesContent: The Categories screen displays category information, allows adding new categories, and editing or deleting existing ones.
kilavuz_prioritiesContent: The Priorities screen displays priority information, allows adding new priorities, and editing or deleting existing ones.
kilavuz_notesContent: The Notes screen displays your notes, allows adding new notes, and editing or deleting existing ones.
kilavuz_getBackupContent: The Backup tab allows you to backup your current data to your device.
kilavuz_restoreBackupContent: The Restore Backup tab restores backups taken previously.
kilavuz_manageBackupsContent: The Manage Backups screen allows you to see, delete, or share backup files on the device. You can also import external backup files.
kilavuz_versionInformationContent: The Version Information tab displays the current version of the application.
kilavuz_abouttheProgramContent: The About the Program tab contains general information about the application.
kilavuz_userGuideContent: The User Guide tab explains how to use the application.
kilavuz_checklistsContent: The Checklists screen allows you to create to-do lists and track items by checking them off.
kilavuz_reminderContent: The Reminder screen allows you to set date and time-based alarms for important events or tasks.
kilavuz_changeSecurityCodeContent: You can change the security code used for sensitive operations (Backup, Delete, etc.) here. You need to know the old code.
kilavuz_changePasswordContent: You can renew your application login password here. You need to enter your old password.
kilavuz_logoutContent: Safely closes the session and redirects to the login screen.
program_description: My Notes app is a comprehensive personal assistant application that allows you to manage your daily notes, tasks, and reminders.
login_verify_desc: Please enter your Username and Security Code to verify your account.
login_verified_desc: Information verified. Please enter your new password.
login_success_password_updated: Password updated successfully! Please log in.
